awards.text: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 win.

fullplot: A little girl comes to a town that is embattled by feuds and intimidated by her aunt. By the time she must leave, she has transformed the community with her indominatable will to see the good side of even the worst situations and bring it out for the betterment of all.
plot: A young girl comes to an embittered town and confronts its attitude with her determination to see the best in life.
title: Pollyanna
writers: David Swift (written for the screen by)
